title: Economic Development and Infrastructure Fund; amend.
subject: Economic and Workforce Development

actions.description: Referred To Economic and Workforce Development

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 57-1-501, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO AMEND THE ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND INFRASTRUCTURE FUND TO ALLOW MONIES IN THE FUND TO BE USED TO AID EXISTING FEDERAL AVIATION ADMINISTRATION-CERTIFICATED PART 139 COMMERCIAL SERVICE AIRPORTS IN THE STATE; TO REMOVE A PROVISION CONCERNING COUNTIES IN WHICH LEGAL GAMING IS BEING CONDUCTED OR IS AUTHORIZED; TO AUTHORIZE CERTAIN AIR SERVICE DEVELOPMENT METHODS; TO AUTHORIZE ACTION FOR PURPOSES OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT, WORKFORCE ACCESS, TOURISM, BUSINESS RETENTION, AND BUSINESS RECRUITMENT; TO PROVIDE THAT GRANTS SHALL BE FUNDED THROUGH A SEPARATE APPROPRIATION FROM THE LEGISLATURE; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
